title: Memory leak in training loop
body: When training for extended periods, memory usage continuously increases without being released. This eventually leads to OOM errors.
label: bug,memory

title: Add support for distributed training
body: It would be great to have built-in support for multi-GPU and multi-node training using PyTorch DDP.
label: enhancement,feature-request

title: Documentation: Getting started guide incomplete
body: The getting started guide is missing information about installing dependencies on Windows.
label: documentation,good-first-issue

title: Performance degradation in version 2.0
body: After upgrading to version 2.0, inference speed has decreased by approximately 30%. This is affecting production workloads.
label: bug,performance

title: Request: Add ONNX export support
body: Would love to see native support for exporting models to ONNX format for deployment optimization.
label: enhancement

title: Crash when loading large datasets
body: Application crashes with segmentation fault when attempting to load datasets larger than 10GB.
label: bug,critical

title: Add examples for fine-tuning on custom data
body: The documentation lacks clear examples of how to fine-tune models on custom datasets. This would be very helpful for beginners.
label: documentation,enhancement

title: GPU memory not properly released
body: After model inference, GPU memory remains allocated even after deleting the model object. Requires manual cache clearing.
label: bug,memory

title: Support for mixed precision training
body: Implement automatic mixed precision (AMP) training to improve performance and reduce memory usage.
label: enhancement,feature-request

title: API documentation outdated
body: The API reference documentation doesn't match the current version. Several methods and parameters are missing or incorrect.
label: documentation
